casebody.data:
THE PEERLESS. HORAN v. HUGHES et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 15, 1922.) No. 271. Macklin, Brown, Purdy & Van Wyck, of New York City (Piérre M. Brown, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Herbert Green, of New York City (Leo J. Curren, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee Hughes. *1005Blodgett, Jones, Burnham & Bingham, of Boston, Mass. (Stephen R. Jones, of Boston, Mass., of counsel), for appellee Doane Towboat Go.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
